mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS modelId, r.file_name AS fileName, r.metadata_id AS metadataId, r.origin_id AS originId, r.file_path AS filePath, n.algorithm_id AS algorithmId FROM t_project p INNER JOIN t_workflow w ON p.id = w.project_id INNER JOIN t_workflow_node n ON w.id = n.workflow_id INNER JOIN t_task_result r ON n.task_id = r.task_id WHERE n.run_status = 2 AND p.id = #{projectId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND n.algorithm_id = #{algorithmId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
